description:
Perfect for those not wanting to take any risks in harsh winter conditions. Mid cut height gives the ankle support you need and the EVA stabilizer and lots of forefoot rocker gives a stable ride platform for fast and healthy feet. The BUGrip® sole provides traction and enables outdoor activities regardless how slippery it is.

  • BUGdri® waterproof membrane is made with 50% recycled PET
  • Durable upper uses recycled polyester with a protective TPU mudguard
  • Fleece sock-like lining wicks moisture away from the foot
  • Partial rand and reinforced heel cap add protection in high-wear areas
  • OrthoLite® Hybrid™ insoles offer all-day comfort and uses recycled materials
  • Supportive midsole compound made from 20% BLOOM® foam EVA with an internal ESS stabilizer
  • 3M® reflective details help keep you visible
  • BUGrip outsole uses a formulated grippy rubber that has 16 carbide tipped steel spikes for excellent traction
name: Icebug Speed2 BUGrip Waterproof Insulated Winter Boots - Women's
